content.raw:
`self.previous_default_output_folder` is being updated when the labscript file changes, so it is already occurring during `load_configuration` \(regardless of whether the user was using the default output folder or not\). 

The default should not change if you are setting the shot output folder to the default, so I don’t think it needs updating there either.

I think we’re good. Merging!
content.html:
self.previous_default_output_folder is being updated when the labscript file changes, so it is already occurring during load_configuration (regardless of whether the user was using the default output folder or not).

The default should not change if you are setting the shot output folder to the default, so I don’t think it needs updating there either.

I think we’re good. Merging!
